verses.text_plain: Woe to them that go down to Egypt for help; and stay on horses, and trust in chariots, because they are many; and in horsemen, because they are very strong; but they look not unto the Holy One of Israel, neither seek the Lord!
verses.verse_html: 1Woe to them that go down to Egypt for help; and stay on horses, and trust in chariots, because they are many; and in horsemen, because they are very strong; but they look not unto the Holy One of Israel, neither seek the Lord!

outline: furnace, oven, fire-pot, (portable) stove for cooking of God's wrath, His furnace (fig) of hunger, desire for evil fire-pot

tokens.definition: יְרוּשָׁלִַ͏ם Yᵉrûwshâlaim, yer-oo-shaw-lah'-im; rarely יְרוּשָׁלַיִם Yᵉrûwshâlayim; a dual (in allusion to its two main hills (the true pointing, at least of the former reading, seems to be that of H3390 )); probably from (the passive participle of) H3384 and H7999 ; founded peaceful; Jerushalaim or Jerushalem, the capital city of Palestine:—Jerusalem.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: Jerusalem (643x).
outline: Jerusalem = "teaching of peace" the chief city of Palestine and capital of the united kingdom and the nation of Judah after the split
the chief city of Palestine and capital of the united kingdom and the nation of Judah after the split
